constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 151 (Tuesday, September 20, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. MURPHY of Florida:
H.R. 8924.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1, which gives Congress the
power to lay and collect taxes and provide for the general
welfare of the United States.
[Page H8011]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: Strengthening Courts for Kids and Families Act
